text: accha! Ke mahakasamandali o prthibi srsti karechena, ara tomadera jan'ya akasa theke pani barsana karena? Tarapara amara ta diye utpanna kari sobhamaya baganasamuha, -- tomadera pakse eti sambhabapara naya ye tomara egulora gachapala bariye tulabe. Allahâ€Œra sange ki an'ya upasya ache? Tabu'o tara satya tyaga kare emana eka jati.
